00022         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00023         {
00024             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00025             int userID = 1007;// (int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID];
00026             
00027             /*
00028             try
00029             {
00030                 userID = (int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID];
00031             }
00032             catch (Exception exception)
00033             {
00034                 Response.Redirect("/login.aspx");
00035             }*/
00036 
00037             var query = from p in orderRepository.Orders where p.userID == userID select p ;
00038             
00039                         
00040             foreach(var ord in query)
00041             {
00042                 TableRow row = new TableRow();
00043                 
00044                 TableCell cellOrderID = new TableCell();
00045                 TableCell cellJobName = new TableCell();
00046                 TableCell cellStatus = new TableCell();
00047                 TableCell cellDate = new TableCell();
00048 
00049                 cellOrderID.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(ord.orderID.ToString()));
00050                 cellJobName.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(ord.job_name.ToString()));
00051                 cellStatus.Controls.Add(getStatusControl(ord.orderID));
00052                 
00053                 cellDate.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(getCurrentOrderStatusDate()));
00054 
00055                 row.Cells.Add(cellOrderID);
00056                 row.Cells.Add(cellJobName);
00057                 row.Cells.Add(cellStatus);
00058                 row.Cells.Add(cellDate);
00059 
00060                 row.CssClass = "orderRow";
00061 
00062                 this.orderHistoryTable.Rows.Add(row);
00063                 
00064                 
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         private Control getStatusControl(int orderID)
00069         {
00070             string status = getCurrentOrderStatus();
00071 
00072             Control ret = new LiteralControl("---");
00073             LinkButton payButton;
00074 
00075             if (status.Equals("created"))
00076             {
00077                 payButton = new LinkButton();
00078                 payButton.ID = orderID+"";
00079                 payButton.Text = "Pay Now";
00080                 payButton.Visible = true;
00081                 payButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_Pay);
00082                 
00083                 ret = payButton;
00084             }
00085             else
00086             {
00087                 ret = new LiteralControl(status);
00088             }
00089 
00090             return ret;
00091         }
00092 
00093         private void func_Pay(object sender, CommandEventArgs e)
00094         {
00095             this.lblNotify.Text = "Order Sucessfully Paid!";
00096             this.lblNotify.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Blue;
00097             this.lblNotify.Visible = true;
00098         }
00099 
00100         private string getCurrentOrderStatus()
00101         {
00102             return "created";
00103         }

00105         {
